transArray.content: The service is very good, the bed is very comfortable, very quiet and not noisy at all, the lady at the front desk is very welcoming, and the little brother will also send the luggage back to the room, highly recommended!

Hello dear guest! Thank you for your recognition of the service attitude of our friends at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. Your encouragement is very important. If life is a journey, we are willing to be your warmest stop. If meeting is a ballad, we are willing to be your wisp. Happy note, I want you to write your mood in notes. Friends, I look forward to meeting you next time at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. I wish you all the best! Manager: Zhao Dan
